## R Markdown
```{r}
install.packages ("tidyverse")

library (tidyverse)
```

## Select data
```{r}
df <-data.frame(t1=c(481,476,458,418,829,843), 
+                 t2=c(459,452,426,419,839,848)) %>%
+ print()
```


## Change
```{r}
df%>%
+ mutate (change= t2-t1) %>%
+ print()

```

## Technial error
 
```{r}
 df %>%
+ mutate(change=t2-t1) %>%
+ group_by() %>%
+ summarise(sd.change=sd(change), 
+           mean.test = mean (c(t1,t2)), 
+           te.abs=(sd.change/sqrt(2)),
+           te.relative=(te.abs/ mean.test)*100) %>%
+ print()
```

## Smallest worthwile change

```{r}
df%>%
+ rowwise() %>%
+ mutate(m=mean (c(t1,t2))) %>%
+ ungroup () %>%
+ summarise (sd=sd(m),
+            swc= 0.2*sd) %>%
+ print()
```
